about_the_game:
Lead a group of interstellar pilots dedicated to free the Atlas Star System from Grax and the Forgotten Legion.

Start your adventure with the full original Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Initiative team.

Included :
* Starlink Game
* 4 Starships : Zenith, Neptune, Pulse, Lance
* 6 Pilots : Mason, Judge, Chase, Hunter, Levi, Razor
* 12 Weapons : Flamethrower, Frost Barrage, Shredder, Levitator, Volcano, Imploder, Iron Fist, Alt. Freeze Ray, Crusher, Super Gatling, Shockwave, Alt. Gauss

A STAR SYSTEM TO EXPLORE
Travel seamlessly through the exotic alien worlds of the Atlas star system and discover its seven planets with their own ecosystem and wildlife.

A WHOLE NEW GAMEPLAY EXPERIENCE
Mix and match pilots, starships and weapons to create the ship of your dreams and customize it to adapt to defeat the enemy.

DEEP RPG MECHANICS
Experience a deep gameplay with RPG mechanics, equip mods on your weapons and starships, unlock pilots abilities and make alliances with factions.
detailed_description:
DELUXE EDITION

The Deluxe edition includes the digital version of : * Starlink Game * 5 Starships : Zenith, Neptune, Pulse, Lance, Nadir * 9 Pilots : Mason, Judge, Chase, Hunter, Shaid, Levi, Razor, Eli, Kharl * 15 Weapons: Flamethrower, Frost Barrage, Shredder, Levitator, Volcano, Imploder, Nullifier, Iron Fist, Alt. Freeze Ray, Crusher, Super Gatling, Shockwave, Alt. Gauss, Hailstorm, Alt. Meteor


About the Game

Lead a group of interstellar pilots dedicated to free the Atlas Star System from Grax and the Forgotten Legion. Start your adventure with the full original Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Initiative team. subs.option_text: Starlink: Battle for Atlas - Standard Edition - $29.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3 GHz, AMD FX-6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 1920x1080, 30 FPS, Low Preset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 3.3 GHz, AMD FX-8350 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For 1920x1080, 60 FPS, High Preset
